title: flag.go doesn't seem to support duplicate flags
body:
by **nicerobot**: 
A somewhat common and useful flag technique is:

./6.out -vvvv

where the same flag is specified multiple times. Such a mechanism seems impossible with
flag.go. It would be useful to provide an array version for flags. Maybe flag.Array,
flag.ArrayInt, flag.ArrayString, flag.ArrayVar, ...

Of course, the above example is a simplistic case and there are plenty of common
examples for allowing more complex duplicate flags to be specified. See rsync and find
for two very common uses.
